title: IVR-Based Real-Time Language Simulation Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning system combining real-time video conferencing and VR equipment.

learning_goals: Learners can perform situational role-plays in the target language for over 10 minutes in IVR simulation environments
Learners can utilize 15 or more culturally contextualized language expressions in VR-based communication scenarios
Learners can achieve over 80% improvement in language fluency during actual video conferences after IVR training
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
